Title: 41155 - # Tech Essentials for Relaxing This Summer
Direction: 675 words. Summer is the perfect time for shutting the world out and recharging your batteries with a little rest and relaxation. List 4-8 tech items that can help people relax when the weather warms up. Choose a variety of items to keep the article interesting. Of course the client's sound cancelling earbuds should be one of these, as they allow people to enjoy their favorite music or a good e-book without any outside distractions. Please try to naturally include links to other products, as long as they aren't competitors to Sony. Your target audience is interested in tech and gadgets.
Anchor Text: sound canceling earbuds branded term (brand/client name)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: listening with sound canceling earbuds from Sony
